className.description: Class/clasess will be applied on the parent div of Breadcrumb

onSelection.description:
Callback function on selecting item

@signature
* ```item``` : selected item obj for breadcrumb
* ```event``` : click event

displayMax.description: number of Breadcrumb items to be displayed

itemClass.description: Class/clasess will be applied on the breadcrumb item

type.description: type of button

kind.description: kind of button  eg : button, submit, reset

className.description: Style class of the component
Custom class on the Checkbox wrapper.

tooltipDirection.description: Tooltip Direction eg: top, bottom, left, right

value.description: Text value to be considered when submitting forms.

type.description:
Used to define the table type
* ```borderless``` : with no borders
* ```compact``` : Compact Table
* ```tall``` : Tall Table
* ```zebra``` : Row striping.

eg :
```
type = "borderless compact zebra"
```

tableData.description: Data record array to be displayed

tableConfig.description: Column Configuration * ```label``` : Column Header * ```field``` : Column key which is present in the ***tableData*** props * ```sortable``` : ***boolean*** value to show sorting icon * ```width``` : minimum width for the column in px * ```renderHtml``` : For passing Custom Html * ```columnHtml``` : For passing custom html in the column header * ```pinned``` : Pass ***'right'*** to pin column right side or pass ***'left'*** to pin column left side * ```allowResize``` : ***boolean*** value to make column resizable * ```minResizeWidth``` : ***number*** value to specify minimum resize width. * ```maxResizeWidth``` : ***number*** value to specify maximum resize width. * ```headerCellClass``` : For passing custom class name for under element * ```bodyCellClass``` : For passing custom class name for under element eg : ``` [ { label : 'Name', field : 'name', sortable:true, width:'100px', renderHtml: (model)=> {return {model.name}} , columnHtml: ( ) , pinned: 'right' , allowResize: true , minResizeWidth: 40, maxResizeWidth: 120, headerCellClass: 'custom-class-name', bodyCellClass: 'custom-class-name', }] ```

className.description: Name of the custom class to apply to the Data Table.

onSort.description:
Call back function on Sorting

@signature
* ```column``` : sorted column ***field*** name
* ```order``` : sorting order
* ```data``` : table data

headerSelection.description:
Used for passing template for Table header

Header of the column with ***field*** value ***"checkbox"*** will be replaced by the below template.
Mainly Used for showing checkbox on Table Header to provide select all features

eg :

```
headerSelection={
   <Checkbox aria-label="header checkbox" id={`header_checkbox`} />
}

```

triStateSorting.description: When this property is set, sorting in each column iterates through three sort states: **ascending**, **descending**, and **unsort**.

columnDraggable.description: When this property is set, columns become draggable and can be swiched with other column

showDraggableIcon.description: When this property is set, icon for coloumn reorder will apprear; default value is ***'true'***

resizable.description: To Enable resize for all table columns. For individual column configuration, check ***tableConfig***'s ***allowResize*** prop.

initSortedColumn.description:
Used to initialize the sorting icon.

* ```order``` : sorting order. possible values are **'asc'** and **'desc'**
* ```name``` : Field Name

```
{
   order: 'asc',
   name: 'name'
}
```

uniqueKey.description:
Unique Key name from the table data.
It can be *id* , *key*, *uuid* etc.

eg :
```
uniqueKey: 'id',

```

selectedItem.description:
This is used for highlighting the rows
 eg:
```
{[id]: true }
```

showDraggableIconOnHover.description: Column ReOrder icon will appear on Hover

removeHeaderNowrap.description: Used to remove nowwrap style from header title

type.description: Type of dropdown eg : top, bottom

dropdownType.description: Type of dropdown eg : multiselect, singleselect

onChange.description:
Callback function on selecting item

@signature
* ```item``` : Object returns id and text value
* ```list``` : List of the selected Item incase of MultiSelect Dropdown

selectedItem.description: id of item for default selection

className.description: Class/clasess will be applied on the parent div of Dropdown

config.description: Configuration Object for updating propery name in items data

attachElementToBody.description: Used to attach the dropdown container to body

scrollListner.description: Dropdown Container position will changed on scroll. This is applicable when Dropdown container is attached to body

className.description: Custom class on the Checkbox wrapper.

type.description: Type of html elements : eg: h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6
Used to define the type of icon

alt.description: Specifies an alternate text for an image

title.description: A tooltip text for an element

className.description: Icon classname

src.description: Specifies the path to the image

onClick.description:
Callback function on click

@event : callback on click

listItems.description:
List items for Timeline
eg:

```
[
   {label : 'Overview', link: 'Overview'}
]
```

errorMessage.description: Error message content which has to be displayed.

customIcon.description: Used to pass custom button template

className.description: Class/clasess will be applied on the parent div of Select

children.description: Used to pass inline element. eg DateSelector, TextInput, Dropdown

className.description: Class/clasess will be applied on the parent div of Label
Class/clasess will be applied on the link
Class/clasess will be applied on the list

type of lists for ordered:
* decimal
* upper-alpha
* lower-alpha
* lower-roman
* upper-roman;

type of lists for unordered:

* circle
* square
* disc
type of loading state eg : default , breadcrumb , accordion , datatable, tab, slider

width.description: Width of loading State. Use this props for default Loading state

height.description: Height of loading State. Use this props for default Loading state

item.description: Item will return on click of the Menu Item

disabled.description: Used to disable the menu item

danger.description: Used to apply danger style to menu item

separator.description: Used to add a separator in menu item

Class/clasess will be applied on the parent div of MenuList

type.description: Notification Type. eg :  danger, info, success, warning

className.description: Class/clasess will be applied on the parent div of Notification

closable.description: to show close icon in notification

targetElement.description: target element where overlay to be positioned

scrollListner.description: Overlay content position will change on scroll when attachElementToBody property is true

onToggle.description:
Callback function used to toggle the overlay content

@signature
* ```status``` : boolean value is sent
* ```type``` : type of click (inside/outside).
* ```direction``` : direction of the click.

attachElementToBody.description: Used to attach element to body tag

closeOnEscape.description: onToggle callback will trigger on click of escape key

className.description: Used to pass custom classname

preventCloseElements.description: used to provide elements, where overlay content will not removed on click of these elements

totalItems.description: Total number of items to be shown in Pagination Component.

itemsPerPageStepper.description: Stepper value which is incremented in multiples of 2 with the previous value.

itemsStepperLimit.description: Number within which Step Numbers are generated.

itemsPerPageText.description: Text to display to the left of the No. of items Dropdown

itemsPerPageInfoText.description: Text to display to the itemsPerPageInfo

pagePrepositionText.description: Text to display to the page Preposition

pageNumberInfoText.description: Text to display to the page Number Info

noItemDisplayText.description: Text to display when totalItem is zero

onItemsPerPageChange.description:
Accepts Event handler as argument/prop which is triggered after Items Per Page Dropdown is changed.

@signature
* ```itemPerPage``` :  item per page value
* ```currentPageNo``` : current Page Selected value

onPageChange.description:
Accepts Event handler as argument/prop which is triggered after Page Drop-down is changed.

@signature
* ```currentPageNo``` : current Page Selected value
* ```itemPerPage``` :  item per page value

itemsPerPageToSelect.description: itemsPerPageToSelect - The value to be selected from itemsPerPage dropdown

position.description: position - Holds the customisable content names to be placed in left and right side of pagination. If empty object, nothing will be rendered

className.description: Style class of the component
Additional class name to be given to <input> tag.

disabled.description: Specifying the <input> tag is disabled or not.

defaultValue.description: The default Value of the field on rendering.

tooltipMessage.description: Used to provide custom message for tooltip

progress.description: value of the progressbar ranging from 0 to 1

label.description: label of the progressbar is placed in topleft of the progressbar

subText.description: subtext for the progressbar is placed in bottomleft of the progressbar

customContent.description: customContent of the progressbar is placed in topright of the progressbar (html element)

* ```default``` : Normal Search
* ```clickable``` : Clickable/Header Search

size.description:
Size of Search
* ```default``` : Normal Search
* ```small``` : applying small search styles

* ```white``` : applying white background in the search text field

iconTheme.description:

* ```white``` : applying white color to the search icon

placeholder.description: Placeholder for the search text field

onBlur.description: call back function triggered on focus out

ariaLabel.description: Used to define a string that labels the component.

disabled.description: Disable select, if this props is not passed the select won't disable.
Specify whether the <SelectItem> should be disabled

disabled.description: Specify whether the <SelectItemGroup> should be disabled

Flag to show input box

errorMessage.description: Used for passing custom error message

hover.description: Specifies the tooltip to be shown on hover

* ```False``` : Large loader will be created.

title.description: This is for title of spinner

closable.description: Boolean value to show or hide close button in Tag

thumbnail.description: Thumbnail for Tag Component as an Object

icon.description: Used for passing tag icon in the right end

className.description: Additional class name to be given to <input> tag.

defaultValue.description: The default Value of the field on rendering.

disabled.description: Specifying the <input> tag is disabled or not.

className.description: Additional class name to be given to <input> tag.

disabled.description: Specifying the <input> tag is disabled or not.

defaultValue.description: The default Value of the field on rendering.

type.description:
* ```Readable```: This is for readable Tile.
* ```Clickable```: This is for clickable Tile.
* ```Selectable```: This is for selectable Tile.
* ```Expandable```: This is for expandable Tile.

expandableType.description: expandableType: top or bottom arrow option.

children.description:
For Readable, Clickable & Selectable Tile:  
  Content for tile.

type.name: custom

id.description: Unique Identifier for Tile, applicable only for selectable tile.

type.name: custom

href.description: Hyperlink refernece which will be activated on click, applicable only for clickable tile.

className.description: Custom class for Toast Component

type.description: Type of Toast Component

visible.description: Boolean value to show or hide Toast Component

closable.description: Boolean value to show ot hide close icon from Toast Component

small.description: Boolean value to change toggle to small

onChange.description:
Call back function that is invoked when Toggle is clicked

@signature
* ```value``` : bool value of toggle
* ```event``` : event when toggled

className.description: Name of the custom class to apply to the Toggle

toggled.description: Boolean value representing state of Toggle Component

type.description:
Type of Tooltip
* ```icon``` : An icon tooltip is used to clarify the action or name of an interactive icon button.
* ```definition``` : The definition tooltip provides additional help or defines an item or term
* ```interactive``` : Interactive tooltips may contain rich text and other interactive elements like buttons or links

direction.description: Tooltip Direction eg: top, bottom, left, right

content.description: Tooltip title. Can pass string or html e

nodeSelected.description: Used to pass default selected node.

expandedNodes.description:
Array of objects which stores the expanded node list
expected format

```
{ [uniqueKey] : true , [uniqueNodeKey] : true}
```
eg :

```
{ 'node-0': true, 'node-0-1': true }
```

expandedIcon.description:
used to customize expanded icon
eg :
```
expandedIcon: <i className="p-hclsw p-hclsw-export" />
```

collapsedIcon.description:
used to customize collapsed icon

eg
```
collapsedIcon: <i className="p-hclsw p-hclsw-folder" />
```

className.description: Style class of the component

config.description:
Configuration Object for updating propery name in tree data


```externalExpandNode``` :  if true, tree component will used expandedNodes props to store expanded nodes

Default Configuration

```
{
   expandIcon: 'expandIcon',
   collapsedIcon: 'collapsedIcon',
   icon: 'icon',
   children: 'children',
   name: 'name',
   hasChildren: 'hasChildren',
   displayChildren:'displayChildren',
   draggable: 'draggable',
   key: 'key',
   externalExpandNode:false
}
```

This is used if the tree data is having a different keys than the default one mentioned above.

if treeData is having **title** instead of **name** can change the config object like below

eg :

```
{
   name: 'title',
}

```

type.description:
Type of Treeview
* ```default``` : Component without any node selection
* ```single``` : Component with node selection

onChange.description:
Callback function on selecting a tree node

@signature
* ```node``` : selected tree node
* ```event``` : click event

getIcons.description:
Callback function is used to provide custom icon for node
This callback can be used if icon passing logic is complex, or not possible to acheive with the help of ***"iconClass"*** props

@signature
```node``` : tree node

overflowOnHover.description: used to display overflow menu on hover. This can be used for showing ***"customActionTemplate"*** on hover

onOverflowAction.description:
Callback function on selecting overflow menu items.
This function mainly used to write logic on custom overlflow menu action. This method is used for *copy* and *cut* overflow action.
* need to make a reference copy of model on copy action from overflow menu and that model should be returned from this call back
* All the other custom overflow action, in which tree node is changed, need to return that changed tree node from the function

@signature
* ```action``` : Overflow Action name.
* ```node``` : Tree Node

onDeleteNode.description:
Callback function on deleting tree node from overflow menu.

this function expect a boolean value. If true node will get deleted.

```
onDeleteNode = { async () => true}

```

@signature
node : tree node

onRenamingNode.description:
Callback function on renaming tree node from overflow menu

this function expect an array.
* ```[true]``` : the node will get renamed
* ```[false , error_message]``` : error message will be shown as an overlay
* ```error_message``` : it can be an html element

@signature
node : tree node

isMoveNodeAllowed.description:
Callback function used for specifying rules on cut and paste
@signature
* ```cutNode``` : cut node
* ```pasteNode``` : node where paste action validation checks
* ```treeData``` : Tree Data

onMoveNode.description:
Callback function on cut paste action or drag and drop
this will trigger before the drop or paste action
@signature
* ```cutNode``` : cut node
* ```pasteNode``` : node where paste action happening

onCopyNode.description:
Callback function on copy paste action
this will trigger before the paste action after copying a node
@signature
* ```copiedNode``` : copied Node
* ```pasteNode```: node where paste action happening

isCopyAllowed.description:
Callback function used for specifying rules on copy and paste
expect a boolean value. Paste button will be enabled if it returns true
@signature
* ```copiedNode``` : copied Node
* ```pasteNode``` : node where paste action happening
* ```treeData``` : Tree Data

onActionCompletes.description:
Callback function after completing the overflow action or drag and drop
@signature
* ```action``` : action name
* ```treeData``` : Tree Data
* ```updatedNode``` : this can be renamed node, dragged node , cut/copy node or deleted node
* ```drop/paste node``` : this can be the node in which dragged or cut or copied node pasted

isDraggable.description:
Callback function is used to define whether the node is draggable
This callback can be used if node draggable logic is complex, or not possible to acheive with the help of "dragRules" props
@signature
```node``` : tree node

draggable.description:
Used for setting drag and drop behaviour for the tree component
* ```none``` : default value. There is no dragging functionality
* ```internal``` : Internal drag and drop functionality will be set. Need to define isDropAllowed call back function inorder to specify the drag and drop rules
* ```external``` : Dragging is possible. Need to the write common drag and drop html5 function to add the behaviour

isDropAllowed.description:
Callback function is used to validate the drop region on drag and drop
expect an array of boolean value
eg :

```
[canDropInside , canDropInSameLevel]
```
* ```canDropInside``` : true mean dragged node can be placed as children of dropNode
* ```canDropInSameLevel``` : true mean dragged node can be placed above or below the dropNode

@signature
* ```draggedNode``` : dragged Node
* ```dropNode``` : Mouse Over Node
* ```parentNode``` : parent node of Mouse Over Node
* ```treeData``` : tree Data

onDragStart.description:
Callback function to add custom drag start function
this will enable only when "draggable" prop should set to "external"
@signature
* ```node``` : node
* ```parentNode``` :Parent Node
* ```level``` : node level
* ```event``` : Event

onDragOver.description:
Callback function to add custom drag over function
this will enable only when "draggable" prop should set to "external"
@signature
* ```node``` : node
* ```parentNode``` :Parent Node
* ```level``` : node level
* ```event``` : Event

onDragEnter.description:
Callback function to add custom drag enter function
this will enable only when "draggable" prop should set to "external"
@signature
* ```node``` : node
* ```parentNode``` :Parent Node
* ```level``` : node level
* ```event``` : Event

onDragLeave.description:
Callback function to add custom drag leave function
this will enable only when "draggable" prop should set to "external"
@signature
* ```node``` : node
* ```parentNode``` :Parent Node
* ```level``` : node level
* ```event``` : Event

onDrop.description:
Callback function to add custom drop function
this will enable only when "draggable" prop should set to "external"
@signature
* ```node``` : node
* ```parentNode``` :Parent Node
* ```level``` : node level
* ```event``` : Event

onDragEnd.description:
Callback function to add custom drag end function
this will enable only when "draggable" prop should set to "external"
@signature
* ```node``` : node
* ```parentNode``` :Parent Node
* ```level``` : node level
* ```event``` : Event

customTemplate.description:
Callback function used to pass custom template. Only expand/collapse icon will be present.
@signature
* ```node``` : node
* ```parentNode``` :Parent Node
* ```level``` : node level

customActionTemplate.description:
Callback function used to pass custom template which will place in the right end of the node. This is used to define custom action in which can add link,button,overflow menu etc
@signature
* ```node``` : node
* ```parentNode``` :Parent Node
* ```level``` : node level

customNodeTemplate.description:
Callback function used to pass custom template for node content
@signature
* ```node``` : node
* ```parentNode``` :Parent Node
* ```level``` : node level

onDoubleClick.description:
Callback function to add double click function

@signature
* ```node``` : node
* ```parentNode``` :Parent Node
* ```level``` : node level
* ```event``` : event

onKeyDown.description:
Callback function to add keydown function

@signature
* ```event``` : event
* ```node``` : node
* ```parentNode``` :Parent Node
* ```level``` : node level

onClick.description:
Callback function to add on click function

@signature
* ```node``` : node
* ```parentNode``` :Parent Node
* ```level``` : node level
* ```event``` : event

defaultEndDate.description: This props allows user to pass default start date

className.description:
Name of the custom class to apply to the File Uploader Button
eg:

* ```Primary``` : 'hcl-btn hcl-primary',
* ```Primary Danger``` : 'hcl-btn hcl-primary hcl-danger',
* ```Primary Danger Small``` : 'hcl-btn hcl-primary hcl-danger hcl-sm',
* ```Primary Small``` : 'hcl-btn hcl-primary hcl-sm',
* ```Secondary``` : 'hcl-btn hcl-secondary',
* ```Secondary Danger``` : 'hcl-btn hcl-secondary hcl-danger',
* ```Secondary Danger Small``` : 'hcl-btn hcl-secondary hcl-danger hcl-sm',
* ```Ghost``` : 'hcl-btn hcl-ghost'

disabled.description: Boolean value to disable File Uploader

multiple.description: Boolean value to select Multiple files from File Uploader

onChange.description:
Call back function that is invoked when File Uploader is clicked

@signature
* ```filename``` : filename
* ```event``` : click event

hideFile.description: Boolean value to hide or show file names selected from File Uploader

required.description: Boolean value, if true, files must be present before submitting the form

links.description: List of links for Footer Component

* ```Danger``` : To create danger modal.

showClose.description: To toggle close button of the modal.

)

actions.description:
To create action items associated with modal.

* ```label``` : button label,
* ```handler``` : function to handle onClick,
* ```primary``` : bool,
* ```danger``` : bool,
* ```disabled``` : bool,
* ```warning``` : bool,
* ```neutral``` : bool,
* ```type``` : type of button

className.description: Class/clasess will be applied on the parent div of Modal

keyboard.description: Closes the modal when escape key is pressed

className.description: Class/clasess will be applied on the parent div of Number Input

required.description: Specifies the number is required or not

item.description: Item will return on click of the Menu Item

disabled.description: Used to disable the menu item

danger.description: Used to apply danger style to menu item

separator.description: Used to add a separator in menu item

className.description: Used to pass custom classname

link.description: Used to pass the link. It will redirect to the link on click

direction.description:
Left: To open overflow menu in left direction. 
  Right: To open overflow menu in right direction

listItems.description: List of the item and associated actions, which should be part of menu.

ellipsisType.description:
* ```Horizontal``` : To make ellipsis horizontal.
* ```Vertical``` : To make ellipsis vertical.

onClick.description:
Callback function on selecting item


@signature
* ```value``` : selected menu object
* ```event``` : click event

attachElementToBody.description: Used to attach the overlay container to body

className.description: Class/clasess will be applied on the parent div of OverflowMenu

customIcon.description: Used to pass custom icon template.

scrollListner.description: Overflow Container position will changed on scroll. This is applicable when overflow container is attached to body

config.description: Icons for toolbar [bold, underline,italic,ordered list, unordered list, link]

onChange.description:
A callback function which will be executed on editor change.
@signature
* ```htmlContent``` : text content from text editor
* ```delta``` : delta object

value.description: content for text editor field.(Can pass string or html)

errorMessage.description: Error message content which has to be displayed.

className.description: Name of the custom class to apply to the Sidebar

activeLink.description:
used to set default active link
eg :
 Active link is set to string or number based on **activeLinkProperty** value
```
activeLink: '1'
```

sidebarLinkTemplate.description: used to pass custom template in sidebar link

expanded.description: Accepts boolean value to make sidebar expanded or collapse

headerPosition.description: Position of sidebar header eg: top | bottom

headerBranding.description: Sidebar Header color change eg: default | primary

type.description: Types of sidebar eg: default | primary

onClick.description:
Callback function that is invoked when Sidebar link is clicked

@signature
* ```item``` : sidebar link
* ```event``` : click event

toggleSidebar.description:
Callback function that is invoked when Sidebar Toggled

@signature
* ```argument``` : toggleStatus
* ```event``` : click event

label.description: Text used to Differentiate Each Tab.

className.description: custom className for the Tab

active.description:
* ```true``` : active class is added to the current element
* ```false``` : active is removed from the current element.

activeIndex.description: Index of the tab to be selected.

onChange.description: Accepts event handler as prop/argument. The event object passed has 'label' and 'tabIndex' keys which is used to get the current name and index of the Tab respectively.

label.description: Label for time picker, if not provided no label will be added.

errorMessage.description: Error message content which has to be displayed.

className.description: Class/clasess will be applied on the parent div of TimePicker

defaultTime.description:
This prop allows user to pass default time

* ```time``` : time
* ```period``` : AM,PM
* ```timezone``` :timezone values

eg:
```
{
   time: '12:00',
   period: 'AM',
   timezone: 'Timezone 1'
}
```

type.description:
Used to specify the type of time picker

* ```hh``` : 12hours clock
* ```HH``` : 24hours clock

className.description: Name of the custom class to be applied to the Step.

active.description:
* ```true``` : active class is added the Step.
* ```false``` : active is removed from the Step.

status.description: status of the Step. It can be of - 'default', 'error', 'completed'

activeIcon.description: An active Icon which can be given to each Step - It can be of image, svg, font icons

errorIcon.description: An error Icon which can be given to each Step - It can be of image, svg, font icons

completedIcon.description: A completed Icon which can be given to each Step - It can be of image, svg, font icons

defaultIcon.description: Default Icon which can be given to each Step - It can be of image, svg, font icons

className.description: Name of the custom class to be applied to the Step.

activeIndex.description: Index of the Step to be selected in Wizard.

linear.description: Steps can't be freely navigated until unless Step's prop, status is marked 'completed'.

kind.description: Variants of Wizard Styles which can be used

iconType.description: Icon Types to be be used. It can be 'icon', 'number', 'noicon'

currentStepLabel.description: Only applicable in mobile Variant style of Wizard.
